androidtabletspcs.com/7-inch-Android-2-2-Tablets]7 inch android 2.2 tablet army of the first half of non-battle after another, has begun to compress the Apple iPad market share. According to Strategy Analytics said, the world's second quarter 2011 shipments of flat-panel devices totaled 15.1 million units, compared with the second quarter of 2010, 3.5 million units, surged 331%. Among them, the Apple iPad shipments hitting 9.3 million units of the new record, accounting for 61% of the global flat panel shipments proportion, though still ranking the top spot, but with the Android operating system and other flat panel devices rise, compared with its market share has been 94% over the same period in 2010, fell sharply.
 The androidtabletspcs.com/10-inch-Android-2-2-Tablets]10 inch android 2.2 tablet from the second quarter of last year, thousands of units, increased to 4.6 million units this year, won about 30 percent of market share. Strategy Analytics said, Acer, Asus, Motorola and Samsung , etc. to promote the industry's next, Android flat products has rapidly spread to many countries, and promote the volume upward. However, androidtabletspcs.com/epad-tpad-7-android-2-3-tablet-pc-arm-cortex-a8-capacitive-touch-screen-web-cam-usb-wifi-two-tf-card-slots-hd-3g-fh8803.html]Tpad 7 android has yet to launch the industry's hot enough to compete iPad models, and the market demand is highly fragmented. Therefore, if the network later this year, the Amazon really into the Android flat areas, will be the Android market into a new stimulus and cause great topic, but the company still need to launch a real good product, in order to under a high with the iPad.
